metadata.title: Ever-Pretty Plus Women's Tulle V-Neck Lace Appliques Plus Size Evening Dress for Weddings 07544
features: Size may run small, please order one size up if not sure
Fully lined, no built-in bras, low stretch
Features: A-Line, V-Neck, sleeveless, lace appliques, stretch elastic band, tulle maxi dress, fit & flared dress, plus size dresses
Unique lace appliques design with stretch elastic band make this evening dress more flattering and perfect fit
Perfect for evening party, wedding party, wedding guest dress, prom party, military balls.etc

Ever-Pretty Plus gives you stylish and affordable dresses with unique design. You deserve this beautiful bridesmaid dress for almost all casual or semi-formal occasions, remember not only wear it for once!
description: Ever Pretty Plus provides you with all beautiful elegant evening dresses, bridesmaid dresses, ball dresses, princess dresses, cocktail dresses and casual summer dresses.
You can find any type of dresses in our shop. And we provide exchange or return within 2 weeks service.
If you have any other questions about our dresses or policies, please contact us or Amazon, we will reply to you within 24 hours.
